channel.title: Server Status Page
channel.description: Is is possible to change the ip of your server? I recently changed my server name and the server ip is still the old one. I'm not entirely sure if this is allowed or if I'll have to start over from scratch with a new account.

item.title: Server Status Page
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

No you cannot change the IP. Just wait till your server passes 40% downtime and it will be removed and you can post a new server with a new IP.

Read full topic
